attributes.action: Please suspend all party political activity and leadership contests.
attributes.additional_details: If article 50 is not invoked in a matter of days, we call upon all MPS to agree a defined period, I e from now until the next scheduled general election and continue as a parliament of national unity. Failure to do so may cause grave damage to the long term prosperity of the UK and our neighbours in Europe
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, are gravely concerned that the EU Referendum caused the wrong decision, due to innuendo, misrepresentation and clever deception to scare the electorate.

rejection.details: This is a matter for political parties, not the Government or Parliament.
